mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, parent_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, parent_id FROM board WHERE id = #{id}

WITH RECURSIVE cte(id, title, content, parent_id, depth) AS ( SELECT id, title, content, parent_id, 0 AS depth FROM board WHERE id = 5 UNION ALL SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.parent_id, cte.depth + 1 FROM board b INNER JOIN cte ON b.id = cte.parent_id ) SELECT id, title, content, parent_id FROM cte ORDER BY id ASC
